title: Police ID 17-year-old allegedly shot, killed by another 17-year-old
content:
Beloit police responded to reports of a shooting at a residence in the 200 block of 8th Street around 8:40 a.m., officials said.
Marcus Seichter, 17, was taken to Beloit Memorial Hospital and was pronounced dead, according to the release.
Beloit police arrested 17-year-old Nikolai Wasilewski, of Beloit, in connection with the shooting. The case has been referred to the district attorney.
Police said they are still investigating a motive.
Beloit School District Superintendent Dr. Tom Johnson released a statement on the shooting Wednesday.
"We are extremely saddened by this tragedy, and know there are two families deeply pained by this. Our district stands by ready to help them, staff and students who may be affected by this unfortunate occurrence in our community," Johnson said in the statement.
